commandDescription: creates new custom Metadata type records from a CSV
inputDirectoryFlagDescription: Specify the directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from (default is 'force-app/main/default/objects')
outputDirectoryFlagDescription: Specify the directory where the file will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/customMetadata')
successResponse: Created custom metadata type records from '%s' at '%s'.
typenameFlagDescription: API Name of the custom metadata type
columnNameDescription: Column that is used to determine the name of the record. Defaults to Name
fieldNotFoundError: The column %s is not found on the custom metadata type %s
